name: Auto Backup for MySQL Professional 2.1 (старое название MySQL Auto Backup)
author: RRFarFarFar
description:
Auto Backup for MySQL Professional 2.1 (старое название MySQL Auto Backup)Год выпуска: 2007
Версия: 2.1
Разработчик: SwordSky
Платформа: win
Совместимость с Vista: неизвестно (у меня XP)
Язык интерфейса: только английский
Таблэтка: Присутствует
Описание: Программа работающая на локальной системе, загружается при входе в систему и делает автоматические резервные копии баз данных MySQL. Имеется возможность делать бэкап на удаленный сервер. В принципе все просто
Доп. информация: текущая версия вроде 3.0, но у меня только эта, так что пожалуйста

Описание на англ. с сайта
Auto Backup for MySQL (the old name is MySQL Auto Backup), is a powerful Windows program that makes it easy to schedule the backing up and restoring of your remote and local MySQL databases. It's easy to back up one or many MySQL databases, and restore them to the same server, or to any server.Auto Backup for MySQL uses reliable TCP/IP protocol to back up and restore your MySQL databases. It's easy to back up MySQL databases, tables and views to SQL or PHP files. And it's easy to export MySQL tables and views to CSV, XML, HTML, and text files.Auto Backup for MySQL can back up MySQL databases to the other server or to the other database. The program can back up all newly-created databases and tables on the MySQL server, automatically.You can to customize the scheduler so that the program would automatically make the backup from the MySQL databases daily, weekly, monthly, any special date or time interval.Auto Backup for MySQL works as a stand-alone utility, and does not require any additional software. It's not necessary to have MySQL installed on your local computer to perform backups or restores.Auto Backup for MySQL runs under Windows 95, 98, Me, NT, 2000, XP, 2003, Vista, 2008 and latest version, and supports MySQL from 3.23 to the latest version. The program works with MySQL Server running on Windows, MacOS, UNIX/Linux, and all supported operating systems.All MySQL character sets are supported, including UTF8, UCS2 and more. All store engines and table types are supported, including InnoDB, MyISAM and more. All MySQL field types are supported, including BLOB, DATE and more.
